name: apply-terraform-config
description: Apply terraform configuration in the step

parameters.usage: specify the source of the terraform configuration
parameters.name: source

parameters.usage: this specifies the namespace and name of a secret to which any connection details for this managed resource should be written.
parameters.name: writeConnectionSecretToRef

parameters.usage: providerRef specifies the reference to Provider
parameters.name: providerRef

parameters.usage: region is cloud provider's region. It will override the region in the region field of providerRef
parameters.name: region

parameters.usage: forceDelete will force delete Configuration no matter which state it is or whether it has provisioned some resources
parameters.name: forceDelete
